item.dc:creator: @Natey Natey
item.description:
@Natey wrote:

[quote=“Skyro, post:109, topic:469320”][quote author=Natey link=topic=586466.msg4212374#msg4212374 date=1359757291]
LOL I sold 3.5g in California for $20. Quarter OZ’s for $30, Half OZ’s for $50 and OZ’s for $85. Everything was 22.8% THC too.
I grew dat louuuuuuuuuuuud.
ONE of my plants in my yard (2012 harvest season) 14 ft tall. If you look around the back you can see some of the others growing (not as tall but they where more then 8 ft tall each.)
[/quote]
How do police not see that?

OT:

In My area in Australian here are the prices.

1 Gram = 20 (Hydro).
1/4 = 70 (Hydro).
2/4 = 150 (Hydro).
1 Oz = 280 (Hydro).[/quote]Haha We had 28 up back there mayne. It’s ‘legal’ in California, I no longer live there I just moved to colorado since it’s legal now so I can mass grow pot The yield was about 90 lbs, 2.8-.3.0 lb’d each plant 3 posted scripts in the yard all legal under California law.

item.title: Cannabis
item.dc:creator: @xxx123xxx xxx123xxx
item.description:
@xxx123xxx wrote:

en.wikipedia.org

Amotivational syndrome

Amotivational syndrome is characterized by detachment, blunted emotion and drives, and executive functions like memory and attention are impaired; it is primarily associated with long-term effects of cannabis use. According to the Handbook of Clinical Psychopharmacology for Therapists, amotivational syndrome is listed as a possible side effect of SSRIs in the treatment of clinical depression.


Ignore the rest of the article except for the first two lines (paragraph) explaining what amotivational syndrome is, the rest is bullshit because there isn’t enough research (they cited like one article lol)

I’ve taken a class on substance abuse, it’s been assumed there’s connection between cannabis and amotivational syndrome but it hasn’t been thoroughly proven or disproven, it really comes down to your brain chemistry and how it effects certain individuals. As a whole I can’t really say anything because it just comes down to you. That’s how it is with all drugs, the effects can be slightly different from person to person or radically different especially if they have a predisposition.

/thread

Read full topic

item.title: Cannabis
item.dc:creator: @tskuasa tskuasa
item.description:
@tskuasa wrote:

I can honestly say I’ve never smoked weed, I have numerous friends who smoke weed however. I don’t think it affects your IQ at all honestly, but in some cases I can see where it might. Its more dependent on the individual, how addictive/easily addicted they are to a substance. For example, If they’re consumed by an addiction to the high of it (Which has happened to a few friends of mine) they don’t really care for anything until they are high, much less school.

Read full topic

item.title: Cannabis
item.dc:creator: @mike4ever mike4ever
item.description:
@mike4ever wrote:

[quote=“Shane, post:98, topic:469320”]Expensive as love

1 gram = 20-25 $
8th = 50-60 $
1/4 = 100-110 $

West Kansas Prices ^

1/4 Is the most I’ve ever bought but I usually just get a couple friends and we each pitch 5 and were good but Marijuana is Amazing it creates some good memories.[/quote]

That sounds about right , its the same thing over here in the DMV(District of Columbia/Maryland/Virginia).

[quote=“jme, post:97, topic:469320”][quote author=mike4ever link=topic=586466.msg4207924#msg4207924 date=1359174754]
120$ for Reg

350$ for Loud

400$ for Dro

[/quote]

We don’t really have those names for it in Canada, although we use the term dro a lot. I only smoke dro, for the compact frosty nugs. But our price differences are huge, I would only pay $160 an ounce for the highest quality dro. It is about supply and demand, and so at times it can be as cheap as $120 dollars for an ounce.

For anything less than dro, it’s at least half the price. Theres a lot of good smokeable outdoor weed around, but it sells for dirt cheap because no one wants it.

On the flip side, our alcohol is up to 4x more expensive than the USA.[/quote]

That’s ridiculously low , sometimes people pay 10$ for a bag that’s .3/.4 . Just because all the drug dealers are out of supply(doesn’t last long). But that’s crazy I can get a huge bottle of quality liquor for about 30$-40$.

Read full topic

item.title: Cannabis
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“mike4ever, post:89, topic:469320”]120$ for Reg

350$ for Loud

400$ for Dro[/quote]

We don’t really have those names for it in Canada, although we use the term dro a lot. I only smoke dro, for the compact frosty nugs. But our price differences are huge, I would only pay $160 an ounce for the highest quality dro. It is about supply and demand, and so at times it can be as cheap as $120 dollars for an ounce.

For anything less than dro, it’s at least half the price. Theres a lot of good smokeable outdoor weed around, but it sells for dirt cheap because no one wants it.

On the flip side, our alcohol is up to 4x more expensive than the USA.

Read full topic

item.title: Cannabis
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“Acorn_, post:95, topic:469320”][quote author=the elve age link=topic=586466.msg4210024#msg4210024 date=1359408285]

[quote author=Acorn_ link=topic=586466.msg4209944#msg4209944 date=1359399879]

Dro, you mean hydroponic. The shit that grows in water. lol
Mids > regs > dank > medicinal
[/quote]Not always true, I’ve smoked some medicinal that was around beast (beast is between mid and loud) but then again, I’ve smoked great med.

Also, does anyone know why you can play music 100 times better stoned then sober? Or why music sounds much ‘better’?

You’ve smoked medicinal in Tennessee, or did they tell you it was medicinal? lol

[/quote]Yes… My cousin lives in Colorado :P. I’m not a nub Acorn_

Just checking you bro!!!
I’ve only had real meds a cuple times
One of my first times smoking was with sum and it was white widow… If only I got it now, I remember I smoked it out of a soda can.[/quote]Hey good call though on that Tennessee status
